channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Unomi

item.title: CVE-2021-31164|2024-08-03T22:55:53.073Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20unomi
item.description: Apache Unomi prior to version 1.5.5 allows CRLF log injection because of the lack of escaping in the log statements.
